fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Choose a card type. Force someone to discard 1 card immediately, prioritizing the type you chose.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Choose a card type. Force someone to discard 3 cards immediately, prioritizing the type you chose. 

*If no cards of the chosen type are found, other cards will instead be randomly discarded. If a card type is not selected when played, a random card will be discarded.*
